name: code_cue_points
title: Cue Points
summary: Learn how to create cue points and listen for them during playback

steps.title: Select a Media Entry
steps.description:
Choose a video from your library to add cue points to.

You can use ```cuePoint.list``` to see what cue points are already attached.

steps.title: Adding a Cue Point
steps.description:
Use the form in the [Live Demo](#LiveDemo) window below to add cue points to your video.

 #### [`Add Cue Point`](#LiveDemo)

codeSnippet.node:
<lucy include="AddCodeCuePointForm"></lucy>
<script>
  $('#AddCodeCuePointForm').submit(function() {
    var data = $(this).serialize();
    $.ajax({
      url: '/addCodeCuePoint',
      type: 'POST',
      data: data,
      contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
      cache: false,
      processData: false,
      success: function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
        $('.container').html(data);
      }
    });
    return false;
  })
</script>

codeSnippet.javascript:
<lucy include="AddCodeCuePointForm"></lucy>
<script>
  $('#AddCodeCuePointForm').submit(function() {
    var cuePoint = new KalturaCodeCuePoint();
    cuePoint.cuePointType = KalturaCuePointType.CODE;
    cuePoint.entryId = "<%- Lucy.answer('entryIdEqual') %>";
    cuePoint.code = $('input[name="code"]').val();
    cuePoint.description = $('input[name="description"]').val();
    cuePoint.startTime = $('input[name="startTime"]').val();
    client.cuePoint.add(function(success, cuePoint) {
      $('.container').html(CodeCuePointAddedView({result: cuePoint}));
    }, cuePoint);
    return false;
  })
</script>
